addi $1, $0, 0
addi $2, $0, 11
addi $3, $0, 7
loop: slt $7, $2, $1
bne $0, $7, notFound
add $4, $2, $1
srl $5, $4, 1
lw $6, 0($5)
beq $3, $6, found
slt $6, $6, $3
beq $6, $0, leftHalf
j rightHalf
leftHalf: add $2, $5, -1
j loop
rightHalf: addi $1, $5, 1
j loop
found: add $8, $0, $5
j finish
notFound: addi $8, $0, -1
j finish
finish: addi $0, $0, 0









0 : 00100000000000010000000000000000;
1 : 00100000000000100000000000001011;
2 : 00100000000000110000000000000111;
3 : 00000000010000010011100000101010;
4 : 00010100111000000000000000001101;
5 : 00000000010000010010000000100000;
6 : 00000000100000000010100001000010;
7 : 10001100101001100000000000000000;
8 : 00010000110000110000000000000111;
9 : 00000000110000110011000000101010;
10 : 00010000000001100000000000000001;
11 : 00001000000000000000000000001110;
12 : 00100000101000101111111111111111;
13 : 00001000000000000000000000000011;
14 : 00100000101000010000000000000001;
15 : 00001000000000000000000000000011;
16 : 00000000000001010100000000100000;
17 : 00001000000000000000000000010100;
18 : 00100000000010001111111111111111;
19 : 00001000000000000000000000010100;
20 : 00100000000000000000000000000000;
